subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Wade Phillips, who has turned the Houston defense into the N.F.L.’s best, will have surgery this week to resolve a kidney problem and will be away from the team for a week to 10 days.
snippet: Wade Phillips, who has turned the Houston defense into the N.F.L.’s best, will have surgery this week to resolve a kidney problem and will be away from the team for a week to 10 days.
